meanings.definition: A part of a microscope that holds the objective lenses
meanings.sent1: The nosepiece on the microscope rotates to change the lenses.
meanings.sent2: She carefully adjusted the microscope's nosepiece to focus on the specimen.
meanings.sent3: The curious ant thought the nosepiece was a tiny carousel for lenses.
meanings.sent4: The nosepiece of the microscope was like a revolving door of magnification.
meanings.sent5: The shiny nosepiece of the microscope gleamed under the bright light.

meanings.definition: The part of a pair of eyeglasses that rests on the nose
meanings.sent1: His glasses kept slipping down, so he adjusted the nosepiece for a better fit.
meanings.sent2: She chose new frames with a comfortable nosepiece that wouldn't leave marks.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy mistook the nosepiece for a chew toy.
meanings.sent4: The nosepiece of her glasses was like a bridge connecting the lenses.
meanings.sent5: The soft silicone nosepiece made wearing glasses all day more pleasant.
